    • Method Detail

      • isInstanceOf

        public static <S,C extends S> com.google.common.base.Predicate<S> isInstanceOf(Class<S> superclazz,
                                                                               Class<C> clazz)
        Create a predicate to see if a given object is an instance of a specific class, given that all objects passed to this predicate will be a subclass of some parent of that class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The superclass
        C - The class
        Parameters:
        superclazz - The class which all objects passed to this predicate will be a subclass of
        clazz - The class to see if the passed in object will be an instanceof
        Returns:
        The predicate

      • throwableContainsMessage

        public static com.google.common.base.Predicate<Throwable> throwableContainsMessage(String expected,
                                                                                   boolean caseSensitive)
        Create a predicate to check if a throwable's error message contains a specific string.
        Parameters:
        expected - The expected string
        caseSensitive - Is the comparison going to be case sensitive
        Returns:
        True if the throwable's message contains the expected string.
